attributes.action: Reinstate Russell Brand and Jonathan Ross on BBC Radio 2.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having reveiwed the current information available, the PM dicatated that the general public opinion was that these individuals were "inappropriate". However the complaints were received from approximately 40 000 people in the UK. The other 60,401,457 members of the British Empire may have found it funny.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
